projects: [{"title":"Strategy and Consulting","start_date":"2019","description":"Our group worked on studying the expansion strategies for Digital Divide Data, we were given a case study with multiple situations and had to devise a strategy as consultants to DDD."},{"title":"Studying Random Walk Hypothesis in Indian Stock Markets: From 2005-2017","start_date":"Dec 2017","end_date":"Mar 2018","description":"Prepared a research report testing the random walk hypothesis for the Indian stock market using 12 years of daily data on two indices from the National Stock Exchange (NSE) and the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), and applying three different unit root tests with one structural break to analyse the random walk hypothesis."},{"title":"Technical Indicators ","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017","description":"Prepared an extensive research report on the effectiveness of technical indicators in the emerging markets like India and developed markets like the United States."},{"title":"Strategic Management ","start_date":"Feb 2017","end_date":"Mar 2017","description":"Prepared a detailed report on the market and corporate level strategies of FedEx."},{"title":"Banking and Insurance ","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Feb 2017","description":"Developed an insurance product and checked its feasibility and demand in the market."},{"title":"Financial Modeling ","start_date":"Dec 2016","end_date":"Jan 2017","description":"Wrote a research paper on the performance of Indian Pharmaceutical Industry by doing an in-depth ratio analysis of the pharmaceutical sector and its top 5 companies."},{"title":"Economics","start_date":"Aug 2015","end_date":"Sep 2015","description":"Designed new consumer product from scratch and conducted surveys for the marketability and sale-ability of the product."}]
